verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> of Korah מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH4905> Maschil אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> O God בְּאָזְנֵ֬ינוּ <WH241> with our ears שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ <WH8085> We have heard אֲבוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <WH1> our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> have told לָ֑נוּ פֹּ֥עַל <WH6467> us [what] work פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <WH6466> thou didst בִֽ֝ימֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3117> in their days בִּ֣ימֵי <WH3117> in the times קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of old

אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> your own יָדְךָ֡ <WH3027> with thy hand גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> the heathen ה֭וֹרַשְׁתָּ <WH3423> [How] thou didst drive out וַתִּטָּעֵ֑ם <WH5193> and plantedst תָּרַ֥ע <WH7489> them [how] thou didst afflict לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> the people וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <WH7971> and cast them out

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֪א <WH3808> not בְחַרְבָּ֡ם <WH2719> by their own sword יָ֥רְשׁוּ <WH3423> in possession אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> not the land וּזְרוֹעָם֮ <WH2220> neither did their own arm לֹא־ <WH3808> did not הוֹשִׁ֪יעָ֫ה <WH3467> save לָּ֥מוֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> But יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> them but thy right hand וּ֭זְרוֹעֲךָ <WH2220> and thine arm וְא֥וֹר <WH216> and the light פָּנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> of thy countenance כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רְצִיתָֽם׃ <WH7521> because thou hadst a favour
אַתָּה־ <WH859> you ה֣וּא <WH1931> You מַלְכִּ֣י <WH4428> Thou art my King אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God צַ֝וֵּ֗ה <WH6680> command יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <WH3444> deliverances יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> for Jacob

בְּ֭ךָ צָרֵ֣ינוּ <WH6862> our enemies נְנַגֵּ֑חַ <WH5055> Through thee will we push down בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <WH8034> through thy name נָב֥וּס <WH947> will we tread them under קָמֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6965> that rise up
כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor בְקַשְׁתִּ֣י <WH7198> in my bow אֶבְטָ֑ח <WH982> For I will not trust וְ֝חַרְבִּ֗י <WH2719> neither shall my sword לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> save
כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ה֭וֹשַׁעְתָּנוּ <WH3467> But thou hast saved מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <WH6862> us from our enemies וּמְשַׂנְאֵ֥ינוּ <WH8130> that hated הֱבִישֽׁוֹתָ׃ <WH954> and hast put them to shame

בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> In God הִלַּלְ֣נוּ <WH1984> we boast כָל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> all the day וְשִׁמְךָ֓ ׀ <WH8034> thy name לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever נוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> long and praise סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אַף־ <WH637> But זָ֭נַחְתָּ <WH2186> thou hast cast off וַתַּכְלִימֵ֑נוּ <WH3637> and put us to shame וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵ֝צֵ֗א <WH3318> and goest not forth בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6635> with our armies
תְּשִׁיבֵ֣נוּ <WH7725> Thou makest us to turn אָ֭חוֹר <WH268> back מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from צָ֑ר <WH6862> from the enemy וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֵ֗ינוּ <WH8130> and they which hate שָׁ֣סוּ <WH8154> us spoil לָֽמוֹ׃
תִּ֭תְּנֵנוּ <WH5414> Thou hast given כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> us like sheep מַאֲכָ֑ל <WH3978> [appointed] for meat וּ֝בַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> us among the heathen זֵרִיתָֽנוּ׃ <WH2219> and hast scattered

תִּמְכֹּֽר־ <WH4376> Thou sellest עַמְּךָ֥ <WH5971> thy people בְלֹא־ <WH3808> for ה֑וֹן <WH1952> for nought וְלֹ֥א־ <WH3808> not רִ֝בִּ֗יתָ <WH7235> and dost not increase בִּמְחִירֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4242> [thy wealth] by their price

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <WH7760> Thou makest חֶ֭רְפָּה <WH2781> us a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <WH7934> to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <WH3933> a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <WH7047> and a derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5439> to them that are round about

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <WH7760> Thou makest מָ֭שָׁל <WH4912> us a byword בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> among the heathen מְנֽוֹד־ <WH4493> a shaking רֹ֝֗אשׁ <WH7218> of the head בַּל־ <WH3816> among the people אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> the peoples

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> [is] continually כְּלִמָּתִ֣י <WH3639> My confusion נֶגְדִּ֑י <WH5048> is before וּבֹ֖שֶׁת <WH1322> before me and the shame פָּנַ֣י <WH6440> of my face כִּסָּֽתְנִי׃ <WH3680> hath covered

מִ֭קּוֹל <WH6963> For the voice מְחָרֵ֣ף <WH2778> of him that reproacheth וּמְגַדֵּ֑ף <WH1442> and blasphemeth מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> by reason א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> of the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <WH5358> and avenger

כָּל־ <WH3605> All זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise בָּ֭אַתְנוּ <WH935> All this is come וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> have not שְׁכַחֲנ֑וּךָ <WH7911> upon us yet have we not forgotten וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שִׁ֝קַּ֗רְנוּ <WH8266> thee neither have we dealt falsely בִּבְרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1285> in thy covenant

לֹא־ <WH3808> has not נָס֣וֹג <WH5472> is not turned אָח֣וֹר <WH268> back לִבֵּ֑נוּ <WH3820> Our heart וַתֵּ֥ט <WH5186> declined אֲשֻׁרֵ֗ינוּ <WH838> neither have our steps מִנִּ֥י <WH4480> from אָרְחֶֽךָ׃ <WH734> from thy way

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Yet דִ֭כִּיתָנוּ <WH1794> Though thou hast sore broken בִּמְק֣וֹם <WH4725> us in the place תַּנִּ֑ים <WH8577> of dragons וַתְּכַ֖ס <WH3680> and covered עָלֵ֣ינוּ <WH5921> with בְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <WH6757> us with the shadow of death

אִם־ <WH518> If שָׁ֭כַחְנוּ <WH7911> If we have forgotten שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> of our God וַנִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <WH6566> or stretched out כַּ֝פֵּ֗ינוּ <WH3709> our hands לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> god זָֽר׃ <WH2114> to a strange

הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> Shall not God יַֽחֲקָר־ <WH2713> search this out זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for ה֥וּא <WH1931> He יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ <WH3045> ? for he knoweth תַּעֲלֻמ֥וֹת <WH8587> the secrets לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of the heart

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָ֭לֶיךָ <WH5921> your sake הֹרַ֣גְנוּ <WH2026> Yea for thy sake are we killed כָל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> all the day נֶ֝חְשַׁ֗בְנוּ <WH2803> long we are counted כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> as sheep טִבְחָֽה׃ <WH2878> for the slaughter

ע֤וּרָה ׀ <WH5782> Awake לָ֖מָּה <WH4100> why תִישַׁ֥ן ׀ <WH3462> why sleepest אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> the Lord הָ֝קִ֗יצָה <WH6974> arise אַל־ <WH408> not תִּזְנַ֥ח <WH2186> cast [us] not off לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> for ever
לָֽמָּה־ <WH4100> Why פָנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> thou thy face תַסְתִּ֑יר <WH5641> Wherefore hidest תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> [and] forgettest עָנְיֵ֣נוּ <WH6040> our affliction וְֽלַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3906> affliction

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָׁ֣חָה <WH7743> is bowed down לֶעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> to the dust נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <WH5315> For our soul דָּבְקָ֖ה <WH1692> cleaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto the earth בִּטְנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH990> our belly
ק֭וּמָֽה <WH6965> Arise עֶזְרָ֣תָה <WH5833> for our help לָּ֑נוּ וּ֝פְדֵ֗נוּ <WH6299> and redeem לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> the sake חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> us for thy mercies'
